{"name": "Burger King Aeon Ayer Keroh", "phone": "03-3362 6526", "lat": 2.23424, "lng": 102.2829616, "review": [{"r_name": "Somsubhra De", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "A fast food outlet located in Jusco opposite Melaka Mall.
Nice cosy place. Can go with friends, as a couple, or even alone for a quick lunch.
The usual style of fast food joints where you order and pay. They give you a number.
The food was ready relatively fast.
The food quality was very good. The presentation with sauce was aesthetic.
The staff were friendly and hospitable even though there was a small crowd due to lunch time.
Sitting areas were adequately spaced. Tables were big enough to accommodate 2 trays per pax.
The payment can be made by cash or card.
Nice place to have lunch, dinner, or grab a quick bite", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Ayuni Nazihah A", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Unfriendly staff. {"name": "Burger Sado Henry Gurney", "phone": "016-815 4616", "lat": 2.1601542, "lng": 102.32170339999999, "review": [{"r_name": "Norbani Osman", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Original homemade like MD.... seriously and must try...if not you all don't know tastes and delicious this Sado Burger. You try and will come again to order.... surely.
Only at night open from 6pm until 12am. Thursday and Friday HOLIDAY.... don't come.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Farhan Fadzli", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Sorry to say but actually most of the comments here are very inaccurate.

Please be clear that they don’t sell “burgers” here, they sell “gourmet burgers”.

To say burgers served here are equal to McDonald’s is really an understatement and the person claiming it surely don’t have experience in quality dining.

Frankly telling, burgers from such franchises like McDonald’s, Burger King, Wendy’s etc. are fast food burgers and they can’t be compared to what they are selling here.

What are gourmet burgers? Google it.

“Gourmet burgers” are a whole new level on another league and to compare them you must atleast compare them to franchises like Fuel shack or better.

The burger patties here are freshly made and grilled to perfection. I can promise all you food lovers out there that its a confirm love at first bite.

Please guys, be honest with your reviews next time.

Im a regular customer and I can confirm that the only rival that could beat them should be “Wagyu burgers” served in hotels, not some fast food chain outlet.

These guys are fantastic and are on a whole new level I can guarantee.

In a nutshell, they sell “gourmet burgers” at a street price.

Who is stupid enough not to buy that?", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "badrul 6608", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "best experience here..i keep repeat order with this guy.his burger very damn good.u should try beef patty burger...very2 nice...sonang kato..mekdi pon xdo la sodap gini haaa...", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Qyimmi", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "The best home made burger.. {"name": "Burger Street In D'House", "phone": "013-841 0818", "lat": 2.2942215999999997, "lng": 102.1392784, "review": [{"r_name": "Wan Norhisyam Abd Rashid", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Title: An Unforgettable Experience at Burgers Street in Da House!

Food: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
The food at Burgers Street in Da House left me speechless! From the first bite to the last, every mouthful was a burst of flavors that delighted my taste buds. The burgers were juicy and perfectly seasoned, and the variety of toppings and sauces allowed me to create my dream burger. Their sides and desserts were equally delicious, making it a must-visit spot for any burger enthusiast.

Service: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
The service at Burgers Street was top-notch! The staff was friendly, attentive, and knowledgeable about the menu, which made the ordering process smooth and enjoyable. The waitstaff was prompt in bringing our orders and made sure we had everything we needed throughout our meal. They truly went above and beyond to make our dining experience memorable.

Atmosphere: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Burgers Street in Da House has a fantastic atmosphere that exudes warmth and coziness. The rustic decor and inviting ambiance made me feel right at home. Whether I was dining with friends or family, the restaurant's comfortable seating and relaxed setting created the perfect backdrop for a delightful meal. Moreover, the background music added to the overall experience without overpowering conversations.

In summary, Burgers Street in Da House is a hidden gem that delivers an exceptional dining experience. The mouthwatering food, impeccable service, and inviting atmosphere combine to create a five-star destination that I can't wait to visit again. If you're looking for the ultimate burger joint, this place should be at the top of your list!", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Wan Nie", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Burger ok", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "sukasuki games", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Nice burger", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Hafiz Adha", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "burger sedap harga murah. ayam kambing rusa arnab smua ade .", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Amin Jafni", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Kedai terbaik burger", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "BOULES PETANQUE Cikgu Afif", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Terima kasih", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Ra Di", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Terbaik", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "mart mart", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": null, "r_ts": ""}], "operation_time": "11 am–8 pm", "operation_day": "Everyday", "state": "Malacca", "city": "Sungai Udang", "landmark": "", "creator_name": "Faizul", "waze_url": "https://waze.com/ul?ll=102.1392784,102.1392784&z=10"}

{"name": "Greenwood Burger Bakar", "phone": "010-891 3912", "lat": 2.194622, "lng": 102.2477497, "review": [{"r_name": "Alan Tee", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Greenwood Burger Bakar in Malacca is run by two young Chinese men who are working hard to make a living. The place is not easy to find as it's located in a corner behind a hidden bar. However, once you find it, you'll be treated to a special burger experience.

The mushroom burger is a must-try, as the mushrooms were tender and flavorful. You can add chicken or beef patty to your burger for RM 15 per patty. I also tried their truffle fries, which were very nice, but I suggest adding better sauce, such as wasabi sauce, to complement the truffle flavor.

The drinks selection is limited, so I didn't order any. The atmosphere could be improved by adding LED lights, soft music, and upgrading the tables and chairs.

Overall, I'm very satisfied with their burgers, and I hope they get more attention from the crowd with some advertising and promotions. If you're a burger lover, Greenwood Burger Bakar is a place you should check out.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Charmaine Lim", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Amazing Street food! Rare handmade charcoal buns! We had the Angus beef with extra egg. The burger is juicy to the core. Some times they food was amazing! But this visit - it was…. 😮‍💨

We had the lemon and herb chicken - flavor was fine. But it was crazy dry. Terribly chewy and stringy.

The peri peri chicken was also dry. 🥱

None of us could finish the chicken because it was a pain to eat.
On the other hand - the sides were quite good. The mash was delicious and silky, the mushroom was really delicious and the onion rings was crispy. Lovely.

The meat sauce fries (poutine) was fine. The fries were not uniform so some were crispy and some soggy, but it was a fun dish to share.

✨ Overall Score: 4/10 ✨
There was a buy 1 free 1 promo though - but i still won’t recommend.

**************************

Shouting when the food is ready. Where we has to collect our own. Upon collecting can see the food preparation place so dirty with flies and ants. The burger stall next to so greasy like haven’t been washed for ages. The planta was open ans can see some bugs harvesting it.
They really need to clean up this place and cook fresh ingredients. This is really messed up. I just don’t understand how some people can eat such unhygienic food.

Will come again.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Alan Tee", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Baboon House cafe in Malacca is refreshing to the city's dining scene. The cafe's peaceful forest-like atmosphere makes for a relaxing and comfortable dining experience. With enough tables to fit more than 15 groups, it's an ideal destination for groups of all sizes.

The standout dish at Baboon House is their extraordinary grilled pork belly burger. It's a must-try for burger lovers. The fresh sausage, which is the cafe's special dish of the day, is also highly recommended and does not disappoint. Coffee lovers will appreciate the cafe's fresh and delicious Americano.

Overall, Baboon House cafe is an exceptional dining experience that is well worth a visit. With excellent food and a serene atmosphere, it's a great place to unwind and enjoy a meal with friends and family. I would definitely visit again on my next trip to Malacca.

P.s. The waitresses there were pretty😍", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Aaron Lim", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Service is always on point, friendly staff

Overall, I would recommend to visit a few times to try their food and handcrafted beverages", "r_ts": ""}], "operation_time": "10 am–5 pm", "operation_day": "Closed on Tuesday", "state": "Malacca", "city": "Malacca", "landmark": "", "creator_name": "Faizul", "waze_url": "https://waze.com/ul?ll=102.2459193,102.2459193&z=10"}

{"name": "LeQUE Steak & Smoked House", "phone": "010-218 8626", "lat": 2.1999456, "lng": 102.2460902, "review": [{"r_name": "Engku Kadir", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Went for dinner @ Friday 9/6/2023 for 3pax.

Ordered:
Portebello Mushroom soup
Black Angus Ribeye - medium rare
Smoked Back Ribs - well done
Aglio Olio Seafood
Add On extra salad
Pisang Bakar Gula Melaka
Fresh Lime
A pot of English Rose Tea

The place was not exactly what u'd expect - its located in an old rustic looking post World War 2 2 storey shophouse, but with an interesting interior with a touch of minimalist modern decor.

Service was pure impeccable, with a smartly attired waiter that looked more like one of those personal butlers u'd find in a high end hotel, who was very attentive to our needs the moment we sat down. Maybe because we were the only customers at that time.

Since it was our 1st time there, the chef personally came to our table to help us order & provided his recommendation on the restaurant's favorite orders.

Took less than 20 minutes when all the food started to be served. First out - the popular Mushroom Soup that came with 4 small slices of mini loafs, perfectly toasted with butter garlic spread. The soup was hot, sumptuous & thick, making it perfect to dip the toasted sliced loafs which partially soaked the loafs & melts richly in your mouth that u want to finish all the 4 pieces of loafs in the soup at one go. Seriously....Its that bloody good.....

The Smoked Ribs - awesomely marinated & smoked to perfection that the meat's own juice mixed within the marination makes you drool again & again till u just can't seem to get enough. That was one of the best ribs we ever had that came along with their delicious home made mashed potatoes & poached veggies. The marination was so good, i didn't even bother pouring the black pepper sauce that came separately with the smoked ribs...yes, it was that good.

The Black Angus Ribeye was...well, above average & not that bad. The meat was tender enough to chew & went well with the black pepper sauce & the poached veggies, but somehow it just didn't cut it as good as the smoked ribs.

The Aglio Olio Seafood - very generous portion that came with prawns, oysters & clams. Very tasty & appetizing that my daughter finished it clean.... satisfying indeed.

The Pisang Bakar Gula Melaka - very uniquely fusion dessert house speciality.......its actually one fresh piece of banana, sliced into 2 & laced with crunchy crystalized caramelized Gula Melaka & comes with 3 scoops of vanilla flavored ice cream. Tasty but a little bit high on the sweetness barometer.

The highly recommended English Rose Tea - this was the real surprise here, as it smelled as good & as fragrant as a genuine rose bud that it felt like i was drinking tea with a bunch of roses around my nose. The distinctive fragrance just nailed it for me & my family & that really made the day for us. Was informed that the English Rose Tea was actually imported from England. Definitely a must. Ooh...the tea, its bottomless, meaning u can add on hot water as much as u want.

Overall, we really enjoyed the food & the service here. Definitely coming back...... awesomely good.

Total damage for 3 pax - RM448.... expensive, but worth every Ringgit if u appreciate genuine freshly cooked food made to order from scratch with a waiter that waits more like a personal butler & attentive service. What a gem - highly recommended.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Salamat Burj", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "The best smocked duck that I have ever tried. It melt like butter in my mouth . Also, the best sirloin stake that I have tried. All together with 3 non alcoholic drinks it costs around ~70sgd. Definitely worth every cents that I spend", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Wan Ameer Ruzman Wan Salaidin", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "The foods are just amazing. The tastes from the mushroom soup, smoke duck salad, Black Agus Ribeye, Full Blood waghyu Mayura, Mash Potatoes(Pomee Pure), grill vegetables and salad dressings are just out of the world. Highly recommended guys. You wont regret it. Reserved early.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Belle Syoda", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Very good and unexpected Halal steak house in Malacca. They served legit A5 Wagyu beef and their black Angus steak was cooked properly with the correct temperature that I requested. Server Wan was very articulate and able to explain to us their food that was available to order. However, they can improve greatly on the timing for food to be served. It took quite a while to serve a pasta and steak dish.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Nadia", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Searching for a good steak in Melaka? This is the place! They serve mouth-watering steak with beautiful plating and tasty mashed potatoes. The steak was cooked to perfection of medium well, exactly like how I wanted. The mushroom soup was also delicious. I also like the ambience of the restaurant. Tips: If you plan to go on weekend, better contact them to reserve as the table there is quite limited. Parking was also a bit challenging for me but we were lucky to find a spot in front of a flat near the place. Despite of these cons, I will definitely go there again if I crave for a steak!", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Aki", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Visited LeQue Steak & Smoked House last Friday during a family trip to Melaka.

The steaks were amazing and so delicious! The sides that came with the steak, which was a creamy mash wrapped in cabbage, was delicious as well.
I can also taste that the bread that came with the mushroom soup was charcoal grilled. Tea and dessert were good as well!

The staff were very friendly as well. Sara, if I am not wrong, was very friendly and explained about the different types of beef they serve, the chefs and what they specialised in and was very knowledgeable. She is very bubbly as well, which made us feel very welcomed.

Will definitely visit again for their amazing food and service when I am in Melaka! ✨🤗", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "wenyee lew", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "The taste is good, especially recommend his mushroom soup, the ingredients are also fresh, amazing. In common sense, usually waiter should ask how many plate or serve the plate based on head count. Lastly, here is why i still put 4 star it’s because of the environment. The truffle fries with wasabi sauce are a must-try and the Americano is flavorful.

The outdoor tables provide a lovely view of the sky and the adjacent historic hotel. It seems like a great place to visit and perhaps even stay for a night. {"name": "Burger Sado Henry Gurney", "phone": "016-815 4616", "lat": 2.1601542, "lng": 102.32170339999999, "review": [{"r_name": "Norbani Osman", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Original homemade like MD.... seriously and must try...if not you all don't know tastes and delicious this Sado Burger. You try and will come again to order.... surely.
Only at night open from 6pm until 12am. Thursday and Friday HOLIDAY.... don't come.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Farhan Fadzli", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Sorry to say but actually most of the comments here are very inaccurate.

Please be clear that they don’t sell “burgers” here, they sell “gourmet burgers”.

To say burgers served here are equal to McDonald’s is really an understatement and the person claiming it surely don’t have experience in quality dining.

Frankly telling, burgers from such franchises like McDonald’s, Burger King, Wendy’s etc. are fast food burgers and they can’t be compared to what they are selling here.

What are gourmet burgers? Google it.

“Gourmet burgers” are a whole new level on another league and to compare them you must atleast compare them to franchises like Fuel shack or better.

The burger patties here are freshly made and grilled to perfection. I can promise all you food lovers out there that its a confirm love at first bite.

Please guys, be honest with your reviews next time.

Im a regular customer and I can confirm that the only rival that could beat them should be “Wagyu burgers” served in hotels, not some fast food chain outlet.

These guys are fantastic and are on a whole new level I can guarantee.

Busan Burger offers a different hamburger experience from the usual hamburger stalls.  Their Signature Cheese Stuffed Hana is good and recommended.  The Hawaiian Hana is good too and worth a try too.

Cleanliness is acceptable.

Staff members attending the stall are friendly and helpful.

Prices are reasonable.  Both cash and e-wallet payments are accepted here.

Parkings are roadside parkings. Getting a parking lot is usually easy

Handicapped patrons on wheelchairs can patronize this stall easily.

{"name": "Greenwood Burger Bakar", "phone": "010-891 3912", "lat": 2.194622, "lng": 102.2477497, "review": [{"r_name": "Alan Tee", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Greenwood Burger Bakar in Malacca is run by two young Chinese men who are working hard to make a living. The place is not easy to find as it's located in a corner behind a hidden bar. However, once you find it, you'll be treated to a special burger experience.

The mushroom burger is a must-try, as the mushrooms were tender and flavorful. You can add chicken or beef patty to your burger for RM 15 per patty. I also tried their truffle fries, which were very nice, but I suggest adding better sauce, such as wasabi sauce, to complement the truffle flavor.

The drinks selection is limited, so I didn't order any. The atmosphere could be improved by adding LED lights, soft music, and upgrading the tables and chairs.

Overall, I'm very satisfied with their burgers, and I hope they get more attention from the crowd with some advertising and promotions. If you're a burger lover, Greenwood Burger Bakar is a place you should check out.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Charmaine Lim", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Amazing Street food! Can choose level of spiciness. Fried Yong taufu with special sauce is unique combination", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Resh Rayan", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Horrible place and experience!

We arrived with a group of 3 and seated, then the cook said to change place cannot sit where we were. So we moved. Its okay laa but then the nightmare starts.
We ordered fried rice and yong tau foo, the yong tau foo was in a a dirty ice cream freezer, giving the benefit of doubt we tried, its taste so not fresh and bad. Like really bad with the salty soup.
Then, the fried rice was cook by the sneezing and coughing cook with his unhygienic hand and continued cooking. Im a street food lover but this is really serious. There have no ethics. Shouting when the food is ready. Where we has to collect our own. Upon collecting can see the food preparation place so dirty with flies and ants. The burger stall next to so greasy like haven’t been washed for ages. The planta was open ans can see some bugs harvesting it.
They really need to clean up this place and cook fresh ingredients. This is really messed up. I just don’t understand how some people can eat such unhygienic food.
We really felt tummy upset later at night.
Will never be back here anymore.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Irfan Hafiz", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Must go place in Kampung Morten. Tips : one plate of nasi/mee goreng enough for 2-3 pax. Wear easily distinguished niqab/attire as your order will be called based on your attire color. If you happened to be regular customer, your order will be called based on your profession :) Food is spicy, make sure to specify beforehand. Drinks also deceiving, normal sized glass here equivalent to jumbo/large size elsewhere. Enjoy your food!!", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Faez Fadzel", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "The place was not packed with people. But you have to walk a bit cause parking is quite limited. {"name": "Huang Chang Chicken Rice Restaurant", "phone": "06-317 0299", "lat": 2.2392011, "lng": 102.25804099999999, "review": [{"r_name": "CW 85", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Very long queue as shown in photos, waited for more than 30 minutes. Ones is required to place order at the cashier counter before get seated.

The chicken meat is tender and soft. The rice ball is quite small. My kids ate for 8 pcs per person but still not feeling full.

The owner shall provide at least 2 clothes for his cleaner to clean the table, not only using 1 cloth, not hygiene and not clean.

Parking can be difficult.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "磬", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Ordering process is so slow, the cashier needs to be more efficient at his job to avoid long queue.

The rice ball is smaller than usual. Flavour and aroma are great, might be too salty. Serving it cold is quite a let down.

Chicken is tender, fresh and served warm. It’s not too oily and there’s hardly much fat beneath the skin. Soy sauce is very salty though.

Dining environment is not ideal, very stuffy especially during lunch time.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Puvendran Paramanantham", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Good option for rice ball and steamed chicken rice. Further away from the busy Jonker street restaurant and looks like mostly visited by locals.
The uncle at the counter is very friendly and accommodative. He suggested the menu and advise order small and add to avoid wastage. Very genuine. The rice ball tasted good and chicken didn't have any raw smell. Also recommended to try the barley lime.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Lena Ng Mun Yee", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Everything is ok. Good system to buy food (had to queue approx 30 minutes). Will come again.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Alan Tee", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Baboon House cafe in Malacca is refreshing to the city's dining scene. The cafe's peaceful forest-like atmosphere makes for a relaxing and comfortable dining experience. With enough tables to fit more than 15 groups, it's an ideal destination for groups of all sizes.

The standout dish at Baboon House is their extraordinary grilled pork belly burger. It's a must-try for burger lovers. The fresh sausage, which is the cafe's special dish of the day, is also highly recommended and does not disappoint. Coffee lovers will appreciate the cafe's fresh and delicious Americano.

Overall, Baboon House cafe is an exceptional dining experience that is well worth a visit. With excellent food and a serene atmosphere, it's a great place to unwind and enjoy a meal with friends and family. I would definitely visit again on my next trip to Malacca.

P.s. The waitresses there were pretty😍", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Aaron Lim", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Service is always on point, friendly staff

This NSK outlet is quite new, having opened late last year. This is the 2nd outlet. The first outlet is at Melaka Raya, next to Mahkota Parade.

Huge portion - one plate can feed 2-3pax.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Arief Exile", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Mee goreng seafood is a must try menu at the shop. Can choose level of spiciness. Fried Yong taufu with special sauce is unique combination", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Resh Rayan", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Horrible place and experience!

We arrived with a group of 3 and seated, then the cook said to change place cannot sit where we were. So we moved. Its okay laa but then the nightmare starts.
We ordered fried rice and yong tau foo, the yong tau foo was in a a dirty ice cream freezer, giving the benefit of doubt we tried, its taste so not fresh and bad. Like really bad with the salty soup.
Then, the fried rice was cook by the sneezing and coughing cook with his unhygienic hand and continued cooking. Im a street food lover but this is really serious. There have no ethics. Shouting when the food is ready. Where we has to collect our own. Upon collecting can see the food preparation place so dirty with flies and ants. The burger stall next to so greasy like haven’t been washed for ages. The planta was open ans can see some bugs harvesting it.
They really need to clean up this place and cook fresh ingredients. This is really messed up. I just don’t understand how some people can eat such unhygienic food.
We really felt tummy upset later at night.
Will never be back here anymore.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Irfan Hafiz", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Must go place in Kampung Morten. Tips : one plate of nasi/mee goreng enough for 2-3 pax. Wear easily distinguished niqab/attire as your order will be called based on your attire color. If you happened to be regular customer, your order will be called based on your profession :) Food is spicy, make sure to specify beforehand. Drinks also deceiving, normal sized glass here equivalent to jumbo/large size elsewhere. Enjoy your food!!", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Faez Fadzel", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "The place was not packed with people. But you have to walk a bit cause parking is quite limited. You have to order and take your foods yourself at the counter.

The yong tau fu and the fried rice was okay. The portion of the foods and drinks is quite big so that's a plus. The price is on the pricier side in my opinion.

The service is satisfactory but it's not for the faint hearted.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "3lmet Hair", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Go if IF AND ONLY IF you got no other place to go. Not worth the price.

Food - Go for the normal fried rice or noodles. those are okay. the yong tau foo is bland. nothing special not even the sauces.

Service - Self service. No pleasant smiles/ greetings/looks from them. Just straight faces. Order food and drinks from the.. They'll call/shout for you get the food yourself. Then pay at counter.

The shop looks a little old. Hence, it looks dirty. Wouldnt say the place is dirty but others may beg to differ.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Nur Aisyah Humairah", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Big portion.. {"name": "Burger Street In D'House", "phone": "013-841 0818", "lat": 2.2942215999999997, "lng": 102.1392784, "review": [{"r_name": "Wan Norhisyam Abd Rashid", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Title: An Unforgettable Experience at Burgers Street in Da House!

Food: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
The food at Burgers Street in Da House left me speechless! From the first bite to the last, every mouthful was a burst of flavors that delighted my taste buds. The burgers were juicy and perfectly seasoned, and the variety of toppings and sauces allowed me to create my dream burger. Their sides and desserts were equally delicious, making it a must-visit spot for any burger enthusiast.

Service: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
The service at Burgers Street was top-notch! The staff was friendly, attentive, and knowledgeable about the menu, which made the ordering process smooth and enjoyable. The waitstaff was prompt in bringing our orders and made sure we had everything we needed throughout our meal. They truly went above and beyond to make our dining experience memorable.

Atmosphere: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Burgers Street in Da House has a fantastic atmosphere that exudes warmth and coziness. The rustic decor and inviting ambiance made me feel right at home. Whether I was dining with friends or family, the restaurant's comfortable seating and relaxed setting created the perfect backdrop for a delightful meal. Moreover, the background music added to the overall experience without overpowering conversations.

In summary, Burgers Street in Da House is a hidden gem that delivers an exceptional dining experience. The mouthwatering food, impeccable service, and inviting atmosphere combine to create a five-star destination that I can't wait to visit again. {"name": "McDonald's Bandar Utama Cheng", "phone": "06-312 2476", "lat": 2.280591, "lng": 102.21546599999999, "review": [{"r_name": "Somsubhra De", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "It is located strategically at the corner of the street. Easy for people to locate.
Loved the option of Dine in and Take Away ordering option on the electronic board.
Payment options both with card or cash at counter. So, it helps people with cash as well as cards. Ones having food in the place can take their number, pay and go to their seats of choice. The server will find you. Thus giving you the comfort of sitting down and not waiting in the line for your food.
Good place for brunch with wide varieties of food available to choose from.
The seating is on the first floor with or without a road view. Good ambience with the place being maintained well.
Ideal for friends or groups catching up for chit-chat or students sitting with their books for revision. {"name": "Uncle Guan Kopitiam", "phone": "06-336 8768", "lat": 2.2277008, "lng": 102.2258614, "review": [{"r_name": "A", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "What a great place for breakfast and lunch at Uncle Guan. Happened to stop by their Google Reviews and decided to try out this place. I feel that it is a hidden gem in Melaka! Great ambience with indoor AC and spacious interior.

The Lady boss was also polite when taking our orders and offering recommendations.

Nyonya Laksa is very good. The base is nice and rich. But the prawns were missing for some reason. Maybe when I ordered, I said don't want cockles so they think I don't want prawns? 😂 no biggie

We ordered a mee hoon kueh. It was okay.

Mee Goreng was alright. The prawns were missing as well.

The drinks were nice! Will definitely come back to this cozy place for makan if I'm in the area!", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "janie janie", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Ordered their Fried Kway Teow, it was tasty! Also ordered the Kopi, both good and has that local Melaka taste.

Sorry the photo was taken after I had already eaten half 😂", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Peter lim", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "The foods not bad especially the coffee really have the good taste if compare with others coffee shop.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Chow Hon Keong", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "This is a Peranakan cafe located in the suburban area of Melaka.  Their set up is very simple.

Started full operations with strict SOPs.  Coffee shop capacity is reduced.

They operate everyday except Sunday.  The cafe is open for breakfast, lunch and tea.

There is a breakfast menu serving simple western breakfast.  The cafe serves cafe menu like Laksa, Mee Goreng, Prawn Mee, Ayam Pongteh Rice set, Loh bak rice set, Curry ayam rice set and others.  The Nyonya Laksa is good and recommended.  Nasi Lemak is only available on Fridays.

Their drink choices are like usual cafe choices.

The food served is above average standard.

Service is good and fast.

Cleanliness is good.

Prices are very reasonable.  Cash and e-wallet payments are accepted.

Parkings are roadside parkings.  Generally able to find a parking lot.  Peak hours during lunch time may encounter slight difficulty in finding a parking lot.

Wheelchair dependent patrons will be able to patronize this cafe comfortably.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Diablos Tan", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "The place is ok i guess, but the food makes up for it could advice you guys to give a try on their signature Nyonya Laksa or Nasi Lemak . Pricing is considered moderate a meal will bring up to around RM 12 including drinks(if you plan to drink)", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Irene Sow Siew Ping", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Delicious food😍😍,especially Nyonya Laksa🍜additional homemade spicy sambal, really satisfying and very good 👍", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Teresa Lye", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "The Friday special, chicken rendang nasi lemak is superb - sumptuous, a complete meal and value for money. This Kopitiam at Malim looks understated from the outside but the friendly service and food served definitely deserve a five star rating.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Min Seaman", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Small portions, tiny prawns, tiny cockles.. otherwise taste is quite good. {"name": "Greenwood Burger Bakar", "phone": "010-891 3912", "lat": 2.194622, "lng": 102.2477497, "review": [{"r_name": "Alan Tee", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Greenwood Burger Bakar in Malacca is run by two young Chinese men who are working hard to make a living. The place is not easy to find as it's located in a corner behind a hidden bar. However, once you find it, you'll be treated to a special burger experience.

The mushroom burger is a must-try, as the mushrooms were tender and flavorful. You can add chicken or beef patty to your burger for RM 15 per patty. I also tried their truffle fries, which were very nice, but I suggest adding better sauce, such as wasabi sauce, to complement the truffle flavor.

The drinks selection is limited, so I didn't order any. The atmosphere could be improved by adding LED lights, soft music, and upgrading the tables and chairs.

Overall, I'm very satisfied with their burgers, and I hope they get more attention from the crowd with some advertising and promotions. If you're a burger lover, Greenwood Burger Bakar is a place you should check out.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Charmaine Lim", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Amazing Street food! Rare handmade charcoal buns! We had the Angus beef with extra egg. The burger is juicy to the core. {"name": "Me'nate Steak Hub @Melaka Raya", "phone": "06-281 2540", "lat": 2.1881963, "lng": 102.25498909999999, "review": [{"r_name": "Yusri Yusop", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "During my recent visit to Menate Steakhouse in Melaka, I had a mixed experience to share. The restaurant's lack of air-conditioning was noticeable, making it feel a bit humid. Communication was a bit challenging due to language barriers, resulting in me receiving Lemonade instead of the Honey Lemon Iced Tea I had ordered. On the positive side, the food, including the beef barbecue ribs and Angus beef striploin, was quite tasty.

The bill came to RM304, including a 6% tax and 5% service charge. While the price seemed reasonable, I couldn't help but notice that the restaurant's ambiance wasn't upscale. In fact, it reminded me more of a casual Mamak restaurant. Although the food was satisfactory, the overall atmosphere was quite average. While there were some downsides, the flavors of the dishes might be enough to draw me back for another visit.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Fannafyn Fannafyn", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "very good food!  The service provided by the team was good.. I was very impressed Chef Azam was very friendly and very enthusiastic in explaining about the meat and it was cooked perfectly.  Overall, it was a good experience 😉", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Angelababy Fishbaby", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Svc is gd. Having lunch promotion from Mon to Thurs 11am-3pm. Eventhough 50% offer,stil remain their level. Very happy. Wl b bk...", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Lillian Wang", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Me'nate probably serves one of the best steaks in Melaka, as far as I know. Tried the Japanese A5 Wagyu some time last year, it was good. The meat was very tender (melt in the mouth) and well cooked. Food presentation was quite fine. Price was very steep though, RM500++ for one piece of A5 wagyu. The A5 wagyu is not aways available, thus it is advisable to call in to check the availability or to reserve.

Besides the A5 wagyu, I have also tried the cheese-baked lobster (Thermidor) yesterday. The freshness of the lobster was guaranteed as it was a live lobster until we ordered it. It was well cooked with generous amount of cheese. I understand from the staff that all their lobsters weight within 800g to 1kg. The lobster is charged at a flat price, RM450 per lobster.

So far, I visited Me'nate for their higher-end dishes, thus my bills were pretty steep. However, the restaurant also serves moderate price range dishes. Generally, price is depending on the type/grade of the meat you choose. Tried 2 types of desserts, and I would say they were just so so.

The steakhouse is open-aired, i.e., no aircon, just fans, mamak shops or tomyam shop alike. The ambience ain't at all cosy and simply couldn't provide a comfortable dining experience for the high price amount paid. Tables were often not in clean condition when we were seated. Service of the staffs should be improved, especially the attentiveness and the way they answer customer's questions.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Hateem Feroze (mithiteem)", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Food Quality: 4/5
Food Price: 4/5
Service: 1/5
Was looking forward to my first trip to Me'nate mainly because of the hype of a reputable Muslim based steak franchise and decided to pay a visit during their Pastalicious 50% off period. Restaurant was not even full during our visit. We ordered three pasta dishes and Ayam Peri2 and had to wait 1 hour for our food to arrive. Even our drinks (as simple as Coke and A&W) took 20 mins to arrive. Food was good, you get what you see on the menu. But really need to improve on their work process to ensure customer satisfaction and reputation security.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Ahmad Loqman", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Had the wagyu steaks and it was cooked to perfection. First time in menate and will certainly be back again for its A5 Wagyu from Kagoshima. Thanks to the chef and staff who waited for us.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Arisha Arifin", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "If you're willing to spend about RM300 for dinner, you'd expect more from the restaurant. The ambience was just OK. There's not much of a fine dining experience, more like casual dining minus the casual feel. More like you come, eat then leave immediately. It's not a place you feel like you can come and hang out. Food options are OK but the steaks are all the same sizes unless you get a tomahawk so the price range is about the same. The black Angus steak was tastier than the grain fed beef but overall, the steaks were just OK. Not the best I've had for the price I paid. It was under seasoned. Best part was that they got the temperature right. The sides were all terrible - bland boiled vegetables that were mushy. The sauces - generic and nothing special. The lamb rack was the only good dish I tried that was good as it was sous vide in herbs and grilled with some kind of honey glaze. Delicious but it gets too sweet after your tenth mouthful. Drinks are free if you order steak- those were nice. I hear the pasta were better but didn't try that.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Rahmah Ramli", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Nice place to enjoy your plate of steak and its related servings. {"name": "Greenwood Burger Bakar", "phone": "010-891 3912", "lat": 2.194622, "lng": 102.2477497, "review": [{"r_name": "Alan Tee", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Greenwood Burger Bakar in Malacca is run by two young Chinese men who are working hard to make a living. The place is not easy to find as it's located in a corner behind a hidden bar. However, once you find it, you'll be treated to a special burger experience.

The mushroom burger is a must-try, as the mushrooms were tender and flavorful. You can add chicken or beef patty to your burger for RM 15 per patty. I also tried their truffle fries, which were very nice, but I suggest adding better sauce, such as wasabi sauce, to complement the truffle flavor.

The drinks selection is limited, so I didn't order any. The atmosphere could be improved by adding LED lights, soft music, and upgrading the tables and chairs.

Overall, I'm very satisfied with their burgers, and I hope they get more attention from the crowd with some advertising and promotions. If you're a burger lover, Greenwood Burger Bakar is a place you should check out.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Charmaine Lim", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Amazing Street food! {"name": "LeQUE Steak & Smoked House", "phone": "010-218 8626", "lat": 2.1999456, "lng": 102.2460902, "review": [{"r_name": "Engku Kadir", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Went for dinner @ Friday 9/6/2023 for 3pax.

Ordered:
Portebello Mushroom soup
Black Angus Ribeye - medium rare
Smoked Back Ribs - well done
Aglio Olio Seafood
Add On extra salad
Pisang Bakar Gula Melaka
Fresh Lime
A pot of English Rose Tea

The place was not exactly what u'd expect - its located in an old rustic looking post World War 2 2 storey shophouse, but with an interesting interior with a touch of minimalist modern decor.

Service was pure impeccable, with a smartly attired waiter that looked more like one of those personal butlers u'd find in a high end hotel, who was very attentive to our needs the moment we sat down. Maybe because we were the only customers at that time.

Since it was our 1st time there, the chef personally came to our table to help us order & provided his recommendation on the restaurant's favorite orders.

Took less than 20 minutes when all the food started to be served. First out - the popular Mushroom Soup that came with 4 small slices of mini loafs, perfectly toasted with butter garlic spread. The soup was hot, sumptuous & thick, making it perfect to dip the toasted sliced loafs which partially soaked the loafs & melts richly in your mouth that u want to finish all the 4 pieces of loafs in the soup at one go. Seriously....Its that bloody good.....

The Smoked Ribs - awesomely marinated & smoked to perfection that the meat's own juice mixed within the marination makes you drool again & again till u just can't seem to get enough. That was one of the best ribs we ever had that came along with their delicious home made mashed potatoes & poached veggies. The marination was so good, i didn't even bother pouring the black pepper sauce that came separately with the smoked ribs...yes, it was that good.

The Black Angus Ribeye was...well, above average & not that bad. The meat was tender enough to chew & went well with the black pepper sauce & the poached veggies, but somehow it just didn't cut it as good as the smoked ribs.

The Aglio Olio Seafood - very generous portion that came with prawns, oysters & clams. Very tasty & appetizing that my daughter finished it clean.... satisfying indeed.

The Pisang Bakar Gula Melaka - very uniquely fusion dessert house speciality.......its actually one fresh piece of banana, sliced into 2 & laced with crunchy crystalized caramelized Gula Melaka & comes with 3 scoops of vanilla flavored ice cream. Tasty but a little bit high on the sweetness barometer.

The highly recommended English Rose Tea - this was the real surprise here, as it smelled as good & as fragrant as a genuine rose bud that it felt like i was drinking tea with a bunch of roses around my nose. The distinctive fragrance just nailed it for me & my family & that really made the day for us. Was informed that the English Rose Tea was actually imported from England. Definitely a must. Ooh...the tea, its bottomless, meaning u can add on hot water as much as u want.

Overall, we really enjoyed the food & the service here. Definitely coming back...... awesomely good.

Total damage for 3 pax - RM448.... expensive, but worth every Ringgit if u appreciate genuine freshly cooked food made to order from scratch with a waiter that waits more like a personal butler & attentive service. What a gem - highly recommended.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Salamat Burj", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "The best smocked duck that I have ever tried. It melt like butter in my mouth . Also, the best sirloin stake that I have tried. All together with 3 non alcoholic drinks it costs around ~70sgd. Definitely worth every cents that I spend", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Wan Ameer Ruzman Wan Salaidin", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "The foods are just amazing. Server Wan was very articulate and able to explain to us their food that was available to order. However, they can improve greatly on the timing for food to be served. It took quite a while to serve a pasta and steak dish.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Nadia", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Searching for a good steak in Melaka? This is the place! I also like the ambience of the restaurant. Tips: If you plan to go on weekend, better contact them to reserve as the table there is quite limited. Parking was also a bit challenging for me but we were lucky to find a spot in front of a flat near the place. Despite of these cons, I will definitely go there again if I crave for a steak!", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Aki", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Visited LeQue Steak & Smoked House last Friday during a family trip to Melaka.

The steaks were amazing and so delicious! The sides that came with the steak, which was a creamy mash wrapped in cabbage, was delicious as well.
I can also taste that the bread that came with the mushroom soup was charcoal grilled. Tea and dessert were good as well!

The staff were very friendly as well. Sara, if I am not wrong, was very friendly and explained about the different types of beef they serve, the chefs and what they specialised in and was very knowledgeable. She is very bubbly as well, which made us feel very welcomed.

Will definitely visit again for their amazing food and service when I am in Melaka! ✨🤗", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "wenyee lew", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "The taste is good, especially recommend his mushroom soup, the ingredients are also fresh, amazing. We arrived with a group of 3 and seated, then the cook said to change place cannot sit where we were. So we moved. Its okay laa but then the nightmare starts.
We ordered fried rice and yong tau foo, the yong tau foo was in a a dirty ice cream freezer, giving the benefit of doubt we tried, its taste so not fresh and bad. Like really bad with the salty soup.
Then, the fried rice was cook by the sneezing and coughing cook with his unhygienic hand and continued cooking. Im a street food lover but this is really serious. There have no ethics. Shouting when the food is ready. Where we has to collect our own. Upon collecting can see the food preparation place so dirty with flies and ants. The burger stall next to so greasy like haven’t been washed for ages. The planta was open ans can see some bugs harvesting it.
They really need to clean up this place and cook fresh ingredients. This is really messed up. I just don’t understand how some people can eat such unhygienic food.
We really felt tummy upset later at night.
Will never be back here anymore.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Irfan Hafiz", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Must go place in Kampung Morten. Only at night open from 6pm until 12am. Thursday and Friday HOLIDAY.... don't come.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Farhan Fadzli", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Sorry to say but actually most of the comments here are very inaccurate.

Please be clear that they don’t sell “burgers” here, they sell “gourmet burgers”.

To say burgers served here are equal to McDonald’s is really an understatement and the person claiming it surely don’t have experience in quality dining.

Frankly telling, burgers from such franchises like McDonald’s, Burger King, Wendy’s etc. are fast food burgers and they can’t be compared to what they are selling here.

What are gourmet burgers? Google it.

“Gourmet burgers” are a whole new level on another league and to compare them you must atleast compare them to franchises like Fuel shack or better.

The burger patties here are freshly made and grilled to perfection. I can promise all you food lovers out there that its a confirm love at first bite.

Please guys, be honest with your reviews next time.

Im a regular customer and I can confirm that the only rival that could beat them should be “Wagyu burgers” served in hotels, not some fast food chain outlet.

These guys are fantastic and are on a whole new level I can guarantee.

In a nutshell, they sell “gourmet burgers” at a street price.

Who is stupid enough not to buy that?", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "badrul 6608", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "best experience here..i keep repeat order with this guy.his burger very damn good.u should try beef patty burger...very2 nice...sonang kato..mekdi pon xdo la sodap gini haaa...", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Qyimmi", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "The best home made burger.. {"name": "Burger Street In D'House", "phone": "013-841 0818", "lat": 2.2942215999999997, "lng": 102.1392784, "review": [{"r_name": "Wan Norhisyam Abd Rashid", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Title: An Unforgettable Experience at Burgers Street in Da House!

Food: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
The food at Burgers Street in Da House left me speechless! From the first bite to the last, every mouthful was a burst of flavors that delighted my taste buds. The burgers were juicy and perfectly seasoned, and the variety of toppings and sauces allowed me to create my dream burger. Their sides and desserts were equally delicious, making it a must-visit spot for any burger enthusiast.

Service: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
The service at Burgers Street was top-notch! The staff was friendly, attentive, and knowledgeable about the menu, which made the ordering process smooth and enjoyable. The waitstaff was prompt in bringing our orders and made sure we had everything we needed throughout our meal. They truly went above and beyond to make our dining experience memorable.

Atmosphere: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Burgers Street in Da House has a fantastic atmosphere that exudes warmth and coziness. The rustic decor and inviting ambiance made me feel right at home. Whether I was dining with friends or family, the restaurant's comfortable seating and relaxed setting created the perfect backdrop for a delightful meal. Moreover, the background music added to the overall experience without overpowering conversations.

In summary, Burgers Street in Da House is a hidden gem that delivers an exceptional dining experience. The mouthwatering food, impeccable service, and inviting atmosphere combine to create a five-star destination that I can't wait to visit again. If you're looking for the ultimate burger joint, this place should be at the top of your list!", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Wan Nie", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Burger ok", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "sukasuki games", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Nice burger", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Hafiz Adha", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "burger sedap harga murah. ayam kambing rusa arnab smua ade .", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Amin Jafni", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Kedai terbaik burger", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "BOULES PETANQUE Cikgu Afif", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Terima kasih", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Ra Di", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Terbaik", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "mart mart", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": null, "r_ts": ""}], "operation_time": "11 am–8 pm", "operation_day": "Everyday", "state": "Malacca", "city": "Sungai Udang", "landmark": "", "creator_name": "Faizul", "waze_url": "https://waze.com/ul?ll=102.1392784,102.1392784&z=10"}

{"name": "Greenwood Burger Bakar", "phone": "010-891 3912", "lat": 2.194622, "lng": 102.2477497, "review": [{"r_name": "Alan Tee", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Greenwood Burger Bakar in Malacca is run by two young Chinese men who are working hard to make a living. The place is not easy to find as it's located in a corner behind a hidden bar. However, once you find it, you'll be treated to a special burger experience.

The mushroom burger is a must-try, as the mushrooms were tender and flavorful. You can add chicken or beef patty to your burger for RM 15 per patty. I also tried their truffle fries, which were very nice, but I suggest adding better sauce, such as wasabi sauce, to complement the truffle flavor.

The drinks selection is limited, so I didn't order any. The atmosphere could be improved by adding LED lights, soft music, and upgrading the tables and chairs.

Overall, I'm very satisfied with their burgers, and I hope they get more attention from the crowd with some advertising and promotions. If you're a burger lover, Greenwood Burger Bakar is a place you should check out.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Charmaine Lim", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Amazing Street food! {"name": "KAK LYNN YONG TAU FOO & BURGER", "phone": "012-319 1967", "lat": 2.2047855, "lng": 102.2497551, "review": [{"r_name": "ezz din", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "I recently visited Kak Lynn Yong Tau Foo & Burger and I must say, the food was absolutely delicious! The Yong Tau Foo and Burger were particularly standout dishes, and I could tell that they were made with care and attention to detail. Overall, I highly recommend this food shop to anyone looking for a tasty meal with great service. 5 stars! - Bang Din", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Sain Dihana", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Waiter was friendly but makcik had a bit of attitude. Price-wise still affordable at rm15 for kuey teow goreng udang with 12pcs big prawns. Taste was ok nothing special. Huge portion - one plate can feed 2-3pax.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Arief Exile", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Mee goreng seafood is a must try menu at the shop. Can choose level of spiciness. Fried Yong taufu with special sauce is unique combination", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Resh Rayan", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Horrible place and experience!

We arrived with a group of 3 and seated, then the cook said to change place cannot sit where we were. So we moved. Its okay laa but then the nightmare starts.
We ordered fried rice and yong tau foo, the yong tau foo was in a a dirty ice cream freezer, giving the benefit of doubt we tried, its taste so not fresh and bad. Like really bad with the salty soup.
Then, the fried rice was cook by the sneezing and coughing cook with his unhygienic hand and continued cooking. Im a street food lover but this is really serious. There have no ethics. Shouting when the food is ready. Where we has to collect our own. Upon collecting can see the food preparation place so dirty with flies and ants. The burger stall next to so greasy like haven’t been washed for ages. The planta was open ans can see some bugs harvesting it.
They really need to clean up this place and cook fresh ingredients. This is really messed up. I just don’t understand how some people can eat such unhygienic food.
We really felt tummy upset later at night.
Will never be back here anymore.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Irfan Hafiz", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Must go place in Kampung Morten. Tips : one plate of nasi/mee goreng enough for 2-3 pax. Wear easily distinguished niqab/attire as your order will be called based on your attire color. If you happened to be regular customer, your order will be called based on your profession :) Food is spicy, make sure to specify beforehand. Drinks also deceiving, normal sized glass here equivalent to jumbo/large size elsewhere. Enjoy your food!!", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Faez Fadzel", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "The place was not packed with people. But you have to walk a bit cause parking is quite limited. You have to order and take your foods yourself at the counter.

The yong tau fu and the fried rice was okay. The portion of the foods and drinks is quite big so that's a plus. The price is on the pricier side in my opinion.

The service is satisfactory but it's not for the faint hearted.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "3lmet Hair", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Go if IF AND ONLY IF you got no other place to go. Not worth the price.

Food - Go for the normal fried rice or noodles. those are okay. the yong tau foo is bland. nothing special not even the sauces.

Service - Self service. No pleasant smiles/ greetings/looks from them. Just straight faces. Order food and drinks from the.. They'll call/shout for you get the food yourself. Then pay at counter.

The shop looks a little old. Hence, it looks dirty. {"name": "Burger Street In D'House", "phone": "013-841 0818", "lat": 2.2942215999999997, "lng": 102.1392784, "review": [{"r_name": "Wan Norhisyam Abd Rashid", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Title: An Unforgettable Experience at Burgers Street in Da House!

Food: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
The food at Burgers Street in Da House left me speechless! From the first bite to the last, every mouthful was a burst of flavors that delighted my taste buds. The burgers were juicy and perfectly seasoned, and the variety of toppings and sauces allowed me to create my dream burger. Their sides and desserts were equally delicious, making it a must-visit spot for any burger enthusiast.

Service: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
The service at Burgers Street was top-notch! The staff was friendly, attentive, and knowledgeable about the menu, which made the ordering process smooth and enjoyable. The waitstaff was prompt in bringing our orders and made sure we had everything we needed throughout our meal. They truly went above and beyond to make our dining experience memorable.

Atmosphere: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Burgers Street in Da House has a fantastic atmosphere that exudes warmth and coziness. The rustic decor and inviting ambiance made me feel right at home. Whether I was dining with friends or family, the restaurant's comfortable seating and relaxed setting created the perfect backdrop for a delightful meal. Moreover, the background music added to the overall experience without overpowering conversations.

In summary, Burgers Street in Da House is a hidden gem that delivers an exceptional dining experience. The mouthwatering food, impeccable service, and inviting atmosphere combine to create a five-star destination that I can't wait to visit again. If you're looking for the ultimate burger joint, this place should be at the top of your list!", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Wan Nie", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Burger ok", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "sukasuki games", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Nice burger", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Hafiz Adha", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "burger sedap harga murah. ayam kambing rusa arnab smua ade .", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Amin Jafni", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Kedai terbaik burger", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "BOULES PETANQUE Cikgu Afif", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Terima kasih", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Ra Di", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Terbaik", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "mart mart", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": null, "r_ts": ""}], "operation_time": "11 am–8 pm", "operation_day": "Everyday", "state": "Malacca", "city": "Sungai Udang", "landmark": "", "creator_name": "Faizul", "waze_url": "https://waze.com/ul?ll=102.1392784,102.1392784&z=10"}

{"name": "Burger Sado Henry Gurney", "phone": "016-815 4616", "lat": 2.1601542, "lng": 102.32170339999999, "review": [{"r_name": "Norbani Osman", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Original homemade like MD.... seriously and must try...if not you all don't know tastes and delicious this Sado Burger. You try and will come again to order.... surely.
Only at night open from 6pm until 12am. Thursday and Friday HOLIDAY.... don't come.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Farhan Fadzli", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Sorry to say but actually most of the comments here are very inaccurate.

Please be clear that they don’t sell “burgers” here, they sell “gourmet burgers”.

To say burgers served here are equal to McDonald’s is really an understatement and the person claiming it surely don’t have experience in quality dining.

Frankly telling, burgers from such franchises like McDonald’s, Burger King, Wendy’s etc. are fast food burgers and they can’t be compared to what they are selling here.

What are gourmet burgers? Google it.

“Gourmet burgers” are a whole new level on another league and to compare them you must atleast compare them to franchises like Fuel shack or better.

The burger patties here are freshly made and grilled to perfection. I can promise all you food lovers out there that its a confirm love at first bite.

Please guys, be honest with your reviews next time.

Im a regular customer and I can confirm that the only rival that could beat them should be “Wagyu burgers” served in hotels, not some fast food chain outlet.

These guys are fantastic and are on a whole new level I can guarantee.

In a nutshell, they sell “gourmet burgers” at a street price.

We were thinking to order a Yakiniku burger, but it was not available, so instead we ordered mini burgers 🍔 and fries as side. The baby burgers are cute and finished within 3 to 4 chews.

The “taste of Japan” is not really there, so I wonder what they mean by Tokyo burger?Perhaps they can out in the menu which part of ingredients is a Tokyo taste, like wasabi or seaweed roll etc.

{"name": "Warung Hijau Rojak Sotong", "phone": "016-919 9545", "lat": 2.3547466999999997, "lng": 102.13888329999999, "review": [{"r_name": "Paul Chia", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Best local food hunt !! Being a local that hopped on a food hunt yesterday and I got blown away by the intense flavours of the food prepared. Don't be shocked by the Sotong Rojak pricing coz it worth the price for the portion served.

Rest assured you won't be disappointed after some narrow drive out from the toll. The food and atmosphere are superb during our visit, even the kids loved the food served.

Definitely will revisit with friends next round.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Nur Afrina Balqis Binti Khairil Azhar", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "This is my second time came here. The pros is the food is really delicious. I ordered the Char Keow Teow Sotong Jumbo and Mee Gireng Udang. The sotong is huge and delicious. A bit expensive but I think it’s a normal price that you can get that big portion of sotong. The Mee Goreng Udang I ordered is actually for 1 pax, but it can be eaten by 2-3 pax as the portion is big. The services is fast also. There are also have free kuih! Highly recommended 👍🏻

The cons is the parking are limited and there will be many people come to eat on the weekend. The queue may be long.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Sebaik Perhiasan", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Large dining area. Very cozy and comfortable. Very clean environment. Nice view of the traditional scene. Plenty of tables. Not too crowded with guests when i'm arrived. Toilet and prayer room available. The staff is quiet friendly and helpful.

Sotong Jumbo is their signature menu. Its quite tasty. Big size squid with regular size of prawn served with either 'Rojak', 'Mi Goreng', 'Kue Tiow Goreng' or 'Char Kue Tiow'. Can be eaten by 3 or 4 people.

But if you come alone or just with 1 friend, the signature menu wont be suitable, as the portion is big and very pricey. They should put a small size menu with a reasonable price for an individual or 2 pax guests.

Car parking will be in people's yards. Not much available. But i think it should be enough to place 20 cars at a time. They provide a small canopy to park motorcycles.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Nor Liyana Mohamad Razak", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "This place will be pack in the evening around 4 pm. But the staff very helpful. Once you want to park the car there will be someone to guide. Once you want to enter the kedai, the staff will hold you until there is empty table for you.
Which is i find it very convenient.

The menu is very limited, they serve mee, bihun and kuey teow with prawn or squid or both. The seafood is amazingly fresh by the time i eat there. And they serve free kuih and you need to take it on your own. But remember to reserve some for other customer.

The price ok reasonable with the portion. I love the prawn. It taste so sweet just on its own.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Massumi", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "The place is quite remote. You have to bear the long kampung road after exiting from PLUS highway (I exit through Simpang Ampat). I reached there at 5pm and the place was already crowded. Parking space is provided. Ordered char kuay tiaw sotong, mee goreng kerang & satay (beef & chicken). Portion was huge, a plate of kuay tiaw was actually fits for 3 pax (for us). So we manage to finish up the kuay tiaw but we tapau the whole mee goreng. The seafood were all fresh & tasty. The sotong was huge & there were 5-6 huge prawn also in the dish. The taste of kuay tiaw & mee goreng; delicious & we don’t mind to come back (we are from JB). We paid RM80++ for the dish. Can choose level of spiciness. Fried Yong taufu with special sauce is unique combination", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Resh Rayan", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Horrible place and experience!

We arrived with a group of 3 and seated, then the cook said to change place cannot sit where we were. So we moved. Its okay laa but then the nightmare starts.
We ordered fried rice and yong tau foo, the yong tau foo was in a a dirty ice cream freezer, giving the benefit of doubt we tried, its taste so not fresh and bad. Like really bad with the salty soup.
Then, the fried rice was cook by the sneezing and coughing cook with his unhygienic hand and continued cooking. Im a street food lover but this is really serious. There have no ethics. Shouting when the food is ready. Where we has to collect our own. Upon collecting can see the food preparation place so dirty with flies and ants. The burger stall next to so greasy like haven’t been washed for ages. The planta was open ans can see some bugs harvesting it.
They really need to clean up this place and cook fresh ingredients. This is really messed up. I just don’t understand how some people can eat such unhygienic food.
We really felt tummy upset later at night.
Will never be back here anymore.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Irfan Hafiz", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Must go place in Kampung Morten. Tips : one plate of nasi/mee goreng enough for 2-3 pax. Wear easily distinguished niqab/attire as your order will be called based on your attire color. If you happened to be regular customer, your order will be called based on your profession :) Food is spicy, make sure to specify beforehand. Drinks also deceiving, normal sized glass here equivalent to jumbo/large size elsewhere. Enjoy your food!!", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Faez Fadzel", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "The place was not packed with people. But you have to walk a bit cause parking is quite limited. You have to order and take your foods yourself at the counter.

The yong tau fu and the fried rice was okay. The portion of the foods and drinks is quite big so that's a plus. The price is on the pricier side in my opinion.

The service is satisfactory but it's not for the faint hearted.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "3lmet Hair", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Go if IF AND ONLY IF you got no other place to go. Not worth the price.

{"name": "Greenwood Burger Bakar", "phone": "010-891 3912", "lat": 2.194622, "lng": 102.2477497, "review": [{"r_name": "Alan Tee", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Greenwood Burger Bakar in Malacca is run by two young Chinese men who are working hard to make a living. The place is not easy to find as it's located in a corner behind a hidden bar. However, once you find it, you'll be treated to a special burger experience.

The mushroom burger is a must-try, as the mushrooms were tender and flavorful. You can add chicken or beef patty to your burger for RM 15 per patty. I also tried their truffle fries, which were very nice, but I suggest adding better sauce, such as wasabi sauce, to complement the truffle flavor.

The drinks selection is limited, so I didn't order any. The atmosphere could be improved by adding LED lights, soft music, and upgrading the tables and chairs.

Overall, I'm very satisfied with their burgers, and I hope they get more attention from the crowd with some advertising and promotions. If you're a burger lover, Greenwood Burger Bakar is a place you should check out.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Charmaine Lim", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Amazing Street food! Rare handmade charcoal buns! We had the Angus beef with extra egg. The burger is juicy to the core. {"name": "Burger Sado Henry Gurney", "phone": "016-815 4616", "lat": 2.1601542, "lng": 102.32170339999999, "review": [{"r_name": "Norbani Osman", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Original homemade like MD.... seriously and must try...if not you all don't know tastes and delicious this Sado Burger. You try and will come again to order.... surely.
Only at night open from 6pm until 12am. Thursday and Friday HOLIDAY.... don't come.", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Farhan Fadzli", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "Sorry to say but actually most of the comments here are very inaccurate.

Please be clear that they don’t sell “burgers” here, they sell “gourmet burgers”.

To say burgers served here are equal to McDonald’s is really an understatement and the person claiming it surely don’t have experience in quality dining.

Frankly telling, burgers from such franchises like McDonald’s, Burger King, Wendy’s etc. are fast food burgers and they can’t be compared to what they are selling here.

What are gourmet burgers? Google it.

“Gourmet burgers” are a whole new level on another league and to compare them you must atleast compare them to franchises like Fuel shack or better.

The burger patties here are freshly made and grilled to perfection. I can promise all you food lovers out there that its a confirm love at first bite.

Please guys, be honest with your reviews next time.

Im a regular customer and I can confirm that the only rival that could beat them should be “Wagyu burgers” served in hotels, not some fast food chain outlet.

These guys are fantastic and are on a whole new level I can guarantee.

In a nutshell, they sell “gourmet burgers” at a street price.

Who is stupid enough not to buy that?", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "badrul 6608", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "best experience here..i keep repeat order with this guy.his burger very damn good.u should try beef patty burger...very2 nice...sonang kato..mekdi pon xdo la sodap gini haaa...", "r_ts": ""}, {"r_name": "Qyimmi", "id": "", "r_item": "-", "r_review": "The best home made burger..
